{{also|Braun}} ==Cimbrian== ===Noun=== {{head|cim|noun form}} # {{plural of|cim|brau}} # {{infl of|cim|brau||dat|s}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{der|de|goh|brūn}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*brūnaz}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/bʁaʊ̯n/}} * {{audio|de|De-braun.ogg|audio}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|comp2=bräuner|sten|sup2=bräunsten}} # [[brown]] # [[tan]] (skin, due to sun exposure) # {{lb|de|politics|historic}} of the [[Nazi]] party and organisations (due to the brown [[SA]] uniform) # {{lb|de|politics|loosely|pejorative}} of the political [[right]], especially the [[far right]] ====Usage notes==== * The comparation forms with [[umlaut]] (''bräuner, am bräunsten'') are chiefly colloquial. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|braun|brauner|braunst}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Braunbär}} * {{l|de|Braunbleierz}} * {{l|de|Brauneisenstein}} * {{l|de|Braunerz}} * {{l|de|braungebrannt}} * {{l|de|Braunhemd}} * {{l|de|Braunkalk}} * {{l|de|Braunkohl}} * {{l|de|Braunkohle}} * {{l|de|braunrot}} * {{l|de|Brauntran}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|bor=1|hu|barna}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Colors]] ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Etymology=== From {{der|hrx|goh|brūn}}, from {{der|hrx|gem-pro|*brūnaz}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/praʊ̯n/}} ===Adjective=== {{head|hrx|adjective|comparative|brauner|superlative|braunest}} # [[brown]] #: {{ux|hrx|Eere Aue sin '''braun'''.|Her eyes are '''brown'''.}} ====Declension==== {{hrx-decl-adj|braun}} ===See also=== {{table:colors/hrx}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] [[Category:hrx:Colors]] ---- ==Tok Pisin== ===Etymology=== From {{der|tpi|en|brown}}. ===Adjective=== {{head|tpi|adjective}} # [[brown]] {{topic|tpi|Colors}} ---- ==Volapük== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|vo|de|Braun|t=brown}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|vo|[braˈun]}} ===Noun=== {{vo-noun}} # (the [[color]]) [[brown]], brown color, [[brownness]] ====Declension==== {{vo-decl-noun}} ===See also=== {{table:colors/vo}}
